observations: The input and output grids have the same dimensions.
In the training examples, a diagonal line of one color in the input is transformed to another color in the output.
The other cells retain their original color.
The diagonal transformation occurs from the top left to the bottom right.
hypotheses: Replace a diagonal line of 5s from top-left to bottom-right with 8s in the output, and a single 5 becomes a 2.
Replace a diagonal line of 5s from top-left to bottom-right with 2s in the output, and a single 5 becomes an 8.
Replace a diagonal line of 5s from top-left to bottom-right with a different color based on row number.

selected_rule: Replace a diagonal line of 5s from top-left to bottom-right with 8s in the output, and a single 5 becomes a 2.
